Samper, Sofía
Rodríguez, Juan Carlos

metadata.dc:title: Caracterización genómica de cepas de M. tuberculosis con menos de 5 copias de IS6110: utilidad de AFLP, VNTR y spoligotyping.
[Genomic typing of M. tuberculosis strains with few IS6110 copies: usefulness of amplified fragment length polymorphism (AFLP), variable number tandem repeat (VNTR) and spoligotyping].
